          <title>
            <string language="en">Effect of pH change on enzyme activity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Effekt der pH-Veränderung auf Enzymaktivität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Effet de changement de pH sur l'activité 
enzymatique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Efeito da mudança de pH na atividade de enzyme</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Effetto del cambiamento di pH su attività 
dell'enzima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επίδραση της αλλαγής pH στην ενζυμική δραστηριότητα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Efecto del cambio de pH en actividad enzimática</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows the effect of high and low pH on the ionisation of the R groups involved in the active site of an enzyme.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">base</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">r group</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">acidity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">active site</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">alkalinity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">enzyme activity</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ionisation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">ph</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">proteins</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt den Effekt hohen und 
niedrigen pH auf der Ionisierung der R Gruppen, die in die aktive Site
eines Enzyms mit einbezogen werden.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre l'effet du pH élevé 
et bas sur l'ionisation des groupes de R impliqués dans le site actif
d'une enzyme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra o efeito do pH elevado e
baixo no ionisation dos grupos de R envolvidos no local ativo de um 
enzyme.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra l'effetto di alto e 
pH basso sulla ionizzazione dei gruppi della R addetti al luogo attivo
di un enzima.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει την επίδραση του υψηλού 
και χαμηλού pH στον ιονισμό των ομάδων ρ που συμμετέχουν στην 
ενεργό περιοχή ενός ενζύμου.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra el efecto del pH alto y
bajo en la ionización de los grupos de R implicados en el sitio 
activo de una enzima.</string>
          </description>
